Uses of Interface
org.xbill.DNS.Resolver

  • Packages that use Resolver 
    Package Description
    org.xbill.DNS  

    • Uses of Resolver in org.xbill.DNS

      Classes in org.xbill.DNS that implement Resolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExtendedResolver
      An implementation of Resolver that can send queries to multiple servers, sending the queries multiple times if necessary.
      class  SimpleResolver
      An implementation of Resolver that sends one query to one server.
      Methods in org.xbill.DNS that return Resolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Resolver Lookup.getDefaultResolver()
      Gets the Resolver that will be used as the default by future Lookups.
      Resolver ExtendedResolver.getResolver(int n)
      Returns the nth resolver used by this ExtendedResolver
      Resolver[] ExtendedResolver.getResolvers()
      Returns all resolvers used by this ExtendedResolver
      Methods in org.xbill.DNS with parameters of type Resolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ExtendedResolver.addResolver(Resolver r)
      Adds a new resolver to be used by this ExtendedResolver
      void ExtendedResolver.deleteResolver(Resolver r)
      Deletes a resolver used by this ExtendedResolver
      static void Lookup.setDefaultResolver(Resolver resolver)
      Sets the default Resolver to be used as the default by future Lookups.
      void Lookup.setResolver(Resolver resolver)
      Sets the resolver to use when performing this lookup.
      Constructors in org.xbill.DNS with parameters of type Resolver 
      Constructor and Description
      ExtendedResolver(Resolver[] res)
      Creates a new Extended Resolver
